thread.title: Weekly Workout: Stability Ball Leg Curl
thread.title_full: Weekly Workout: Stability Ball Leg Curl

author: Derek Call
title: Weekly Workout: Stability Ball Leg Curl
text:
Weekly Workout: Stability Ball Leg Curl Strengthen your core and hamstrings by properly performing this move. By Jen Ator Wednesday, March 29, 2017, 8:57 am 
Many runners know adding strength-training into their regimine is important, but they often neglect to make sure they are using proper form. In this video, Jen Ator, fitness director of Women's Health , shows Runner' World Social Media Editor Hannah McGoldrick how to properly perform the stability ball leg curl. Advertisement
